participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and determined, Maya is someone who values both her artistic passions and her commitment to personal growth. She is eager to learn and explore new hobbies.
participant_1.background: I want to find a place to live that is perfect for my hobbies and interests. I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job. I have a black thumb when it comes to growing plants, but I'm determined to learn more about native plants and how to grow them in my garden. I'm a vegan. I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Jason is driven by a need for self-expression and authenticity. He is passionate about writing and storytelling, and often finds himself navigating personal challenges.
participant_2.background: I need to feel like I can be myself around my partner. I am going to school for writing. I don't see colors very well, but I can still chop vegetables and follow recipes. I want to be a journalist, but instead I sell washers at Sears. I want to quit skiing, but I'm afraid of disappointing my parents.

content.text: Hey! What do you like to do in your free time?
I like to write, and I'm going to school for it!
Oh that's awesome! I've always wanted to write, but never really knew where to start.
Well, I'm still learning myself! I've been writing for a long time, but I've only recently started taking it seriously.
That's great! I'm glad you're pursuing your passion.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it!
What are you most passionate about?
I'm passionate about a lot of things, but I think my biggest passion is storytelling. I love creating characters and worlds that people can connect with.
That's so great! I love hearing about people's passions.
What kind of writing do you do?
I mostly write short stories and novellas, but I'm also working on a novel.
Oh that's awesome! I would love to read some of your work sometime.
Thanks! I'll be sure to let you know when I have something published.
Great! I look forward to it
